Virtual Private Servers are the mid level solution for those that need the control of a root based server,  it's a dedicated server without the cost.

At Domainsatcost.com we offer affordable and reliable VPS plans, 100% scalable, meaning you can start with our lowest package, and work your way up as you grow!

**OpenVZ Starter**  
2 CPU Cores  
RAM - 768 MB  
Disk Space - 30 GB  
Bandwidth - 1000 GB  
Port speed - 100 Mbit  
**Monthly price - $5/m (no contract necessary)**  

We provide our clients with 24/7 live support and 99.99% uptime guarantee.

For further information visit: [http://domainsatcost.com/](http://domainsatcost.com/)
